message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This round only!
Time is money Alice!  Let's be practical - this offer is my bottom line.
You're running out of time, Bob.
Okay Alice, let's split this right down the middle.  Take it or leave it, we're running out of time!
Middle ground was last round, now it's my turn!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Meet me halfway at least - it's better than nothing if we run out of time!
You should have taken my previous offer, now it's even less
